ctx: destruct a as [l1 p1], b as [l2 p2].
exceptions.tactic: destruct (canonical A0 eqA ltM l1) eqn: C1, (canonical A0 eqA ltM l2) eqn: C2.

ctx: destruct a as [l1 p1], b as [l2 p2].
destruct a as [l1 p1], b as [l2 p2].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) l1 : list (Term A n) p1 : canonical A0 eqA ltM l1 l2 : list (Term A n) p2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM l2 Unable to unify "True" with "match l2 as l return (canonical A0 eqA ltM l -> forall x : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM x -> Prop) with | nil => fun (_ : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil) (x0 : list (Term A n)) (_ : canonical A0 eqA ltM x0) => True | a0 :: l => fun (_ : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a0 :: l)) (x0 : list (Term A n)) => match x0 as l0 return (canonical A0 eqA ltM l0 -> Prop) with | nil => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil => True | a1 :: l0 => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a1 :: l0) => eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) (ppc A1 (n:=n) a0 a1) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a0 a1) end end p2 l1 p1".

ctx: destruct a as [l1 p1], b as [l2 p2].
destruct a as [l1 p1], b as [l2 p2].
destruct a as [l1 p1], b as [l2 p2].

original: intros a b. destruct a as [l1 p1], b as [l2 p2]. destruct (canonical A0 eqA ltM l1) eqn: C1, (canonical A0 eqA ltM l2) eqn: C2. - left. red. intros _ _. apply I. - right. intros H. inversion H. subst. discriminate. - right. intros H. inversion H. subst. discriminate. - right. intros H. inversion H. subst. discriminate.
